title: Test fail in TimeRoutedAliasUpdateProcessorTest RE "We need to create a new time routed collection but for unknown reasons were unable to do so."
description:
Two test fails came up recently with this exception:
o.a.s.h.RequestHandlerBase org.apache.solr.common.SolrException: We need to create a new time routed collection but for unknown reasons were unable to do so.
It's a message in TimeRoutedAliasUpdateProcessor.

thetaphi/Lucene-Solr-7.x-MacOSX/602
thetaphi/Lucene-Solr-master-Solaris/1820
